Text:
I was converting those FLVs to XviD, but I decided to wait for tonight's re-airing of all 4 of the first episodes and capture them and convert from original captures. So, I'll be doing this tonight and comparing quality to see if what I capture and encode is any better.

BTW, these forst for episodes happen to be in alphabetical order, so Amazon is Ep1, Botswana is Ep2, Louisiana is Ep3 and Tasmania is Ep4.
